      • SearchHelper

        public static <T extends Searchable> javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> SearchHelper(java.util.List<T> list,
                                                                                       java.lang.String searchCriteria,
                                                                                       java.lang.String searchTerm)
        Generic search method to prevent duplications on list searches
        Type Parameters:
        T - An object which implements the Searchable interface
        Parameters:
        list - List of objects to be check if they provide the criteria
        searchCriteria - Criteria of search, the thing user is looking for
        searchTerm - Term of search, in which part of the object user is looking for the criteria
        Returns:
        Observable list of items which provide the criteria
